post.description: batch query task information (up to 100 items per query)
download mobile files to local device
get a list of supported mobile phone brands

get.description: check the status of phone tasks

uploadType.description: Upload type: 1=APP upload, 2=Temporary file upload, 3=Advanced file import

finished.description: Whether the upload is complete (whether the chunks have been merged)

pageSize.description: Number of records displayed per page

TableDataInfoApiPhoneFileInfoResVO.description: Unified return class for list query results

realResolution.description: whether to use the actual device resolution

pushDestDir.description: Target directory for pushing files (default: /sdcard/Download for non-images, /sdcard/DCIM for images)

uploadType.description: File upload type: 1-Regular file, 2-Live stream file

mergeList.description: List of file chunks to merge

etag.description: ETag identifier for the uploaded part

partNumber.description: Part number of the upload (sequence number)

UploadMergeReqVo.description: List of file chunks to merge

appOp.description: Operation to perform: uninstall=Uninstall, start=Start, restart=Restart, stop=Stop, clear=Clear

pageSize.description: Number of records displayed per page

TableDataInfoAppListV2ResVO.description: Unified return class for list query results

withG.description: Whether to grant all permissions to the application

ProductSkuExtraPriceInfoVO.description: Additional price information of product SKU

isAutoRenewal.description: Whether to auto-renew, currently fixed as: true

skuExtraPriceList.description: Additional price information of product SKU

operateType.description: Phone operation type: powerOn, reset, restart, renew

TableDataInfoPhonePageListResVO.description: Unified return class for list query results
